name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MY Shopee Seller Center Ads Table Width Adjuster

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension reformats the Shopee Seller Ads table to a wider view. With a full view, sellers can easily analyse Expense, Conversions, ROAS and ACOS per product.

V1.1 Update.  CSS ID changed
